tool_description: Gathers comprehensive building information including construction details, occupancy type, size, age, and existing accessibility features to establish baseline data for accessibility assessment.

building_address.description: Complete street address of the building to be assessed

building_name.description: Official name or identifier of the building

occupancy_type.description: Primary building use: office, retail, educational, healthcare, residential, mixed-use, industrial, religious, entertainment, government

error_messages: Invalid address format: Provide a complete street address including street number, name, city, state, and zip code.
Unsupported occupancy type: Use one of the specified building use categories.
Building not found: The provided address cannot be located in available databases.
usage: Enter the building address and occupancy type to retrieve foundational building data. Building name is optional but helps with identification in reports.

building_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to the building

construction_year.description: Year the building was originally constructed

total_floors.description: Number of floors in the building

gross_square_footage.description: Total building area in square feet

applicable_codes.description: List of accessibility codes and standards that apply to this building
